column1: Local Foods////I mainly come here for the people watching
column2: but the food selection is great. Always fresh salads and sandwiches
column3: with wonderfully imaginative combinations and great lemonade. And if what's on offer doesn't strike for fancy
column4: ask if they have something that does. They've always been real accommodating with my random requests. Quirky
column6: but it fits with the area and the clientele (again
column7: my favourite part of every visit; such pretty pretty people frequent this place!)
